Salt Ambassador Program Bulletin
December 2016/January 2017
Greetings to our Salt® Ambassadors and Advisors!
Welcome to the December/January 2016 Salt Ambassador Program Bulletin, the vehicle that provides you with money tips to share and tools to increase awareness about Salt. Here are things you can do this month to help promote money management and spread the word about Salt. Share the suggestions below through your school and personal social media channels.
Share Salt Courses with students to help them with their financial well-being
These interactive money courses help you take control of your finances and student loans. Saltmoney.org/saltcourses
Promote Salt article - How To Give Gifts Without Spending Too Much Money
Giving a gift can become stressful if you're not sure how much to spend—or can't afford to spend much. By setting limits and being creative, you can keep your experience (and your recipient) happy.
Check out the most popular content on Saltmoney.org last month
Know What You Owe is a resource that helps you keep track of your debt in one place. saltmoney.org/KWYO
